Back to: [FOV Size Reference](../FOV-size.md)

| 224 | 3440x1440 | 1608x608 |

| 448 | 3440x1440 | 1496x496 |
| 480 | 3440x1440 | 1480x480 |

| 576 | 3440x1440 | 1432x432 |
| 608 | 3440x1440 | 1416x416 |
